description: This file defines a React functional component for a checkout page in a Next.js app. It interacts with URL search parameters, manages UI state for payment processing, and makes an API call to initiate a payment intent.

methods.name: CheckoutPage
methods.description: React component for the checkout page, handles user interactions and payment initiation.

methods.name: startPayment
methods.description: Async function to initiate payment process by requesting a PaymentIntent from backend.
